snippet.title: Steam Chain Any% Glitchless [World Record] Speedrun 02:35
snippet.description:
It's still possible to shave a few seconds here an there, especially depending on the amount of time you need to spend in order to adjust yourself on the gears. Also, horizontal sections are more speedrun friendly, but I'll let the hardcore fanbase figure those out.

Try it out yourself: https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSdWURIByaJqrSqANIxTY57P5Ekuxfnap8t7lLWiJcKmvjUFMg/viewform?usp=sf_link

Music by Filipe Simões https://soundcloud.com/farsycho

Steam Chain is a steampunk platformer with a focus on world-building and satisfying moment to moment gameplay, supported by a fluent movement system and puzzles organically integrated with it. Stay tuned for more updates!


Twitter:https: //twitter.com/WildLynxDev
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/wildlynxstudios.dev/?hl=en
Blog: https://www.indiedb.com/members/wildlynxstudios
